title: Create React + PixiJS client scaffold
description: Set up packages/client with Vite, React 19, PixiJS 8, basic canvas container, and WebSocket client connection
close_reason: Server: WebSocket with session management, message routing, game state. Client: WebSocket client, Zustand store, PixiJS canvas. 74 tests passing.

title: Implement Overworld game loop
description: Turn structure, resource upkeep, action phase. Corp places influence, installs assets. Runner triggers scenarios.

title: Create Weyland starter deck (10-15 cards)
description: Design and implement Corp starter cards using component system. Focus on barriers, economy, and agenda advancement.
close_reason: Territory system with hex grid (22 tests), Weyland deck (15 cards, 8 tests), Anarch deck (12 cards, 25 tests). 129 total tests passing.

title: Create Anarch starter deck (10-15 cards)
description: Design and implement Runner starter cards using component system. Focus on viruses, icebreakers, and destructive events.
close_reason: Territory system with hex grid (22 tests), Weyland deck (15 cards, 8 tests), Anarch deck (12 cards, 25 tests). 129 total tests passing.

title: Define shared game types and message protocol
description: Create TypeScript types for: GameState, Territory, Card, Player, Faction, and WebSocket message discriminated unions in packages/shared

title: Initialize monorepo with Turborepo + pnpm workspaces
description: Set up packages/{client,server,shared,db} structure with TypeScript configs, Biome, and basic build scripts

title: Implement hex grid territory system
description: 3x3 hex grid with Territory type (securityLevel, resourceValue, corporateInfluence). Server-side state + PixiJS rendering with click interaction
close_reason: Territory system with hex grid (22 tests), Weyland deck (15 cards, 8 tests), Anarch deck (12 cards, 25 tests). 129 total tests passing.

title: Implement Overworld â†” Scenario interplay
description: Territory state affects scenario parameters. Scenario outcome updates territory. This is the core loop to validate.

title: Implement card component system core
description: Build stateless component execution engine: ComponentType enum, ExecutionContext, ComponentResult, and basic components (CreditCost, GainCredits, DealDamage)

title: Implement Scenario mission system
description: Instanced scenario triggered from territory. Setup based on territory state, card play, ICE encounters, success/fail resolution.

title: Set up Hono server with WebSocket support
description: Create packages/server with Hono HTTP + WebSocket upgrade, basic connection management, JSON message parsing
close_reason: Server: WebSocket with session management, message routing, game state. Client: WebSocket client, Zustand store, PixiJS canvas. 74 tests passing.
